title: Whiskey Off-Road: The Mountain Bike Race That Cuts Through the Gravel Craze
content:
Squint and the marathon mountain bike festival in Prescott, Arizona, looks a lot like America’s most successful gravel races – but the fact that it is strictly not gravel is what keeps people coming back.

Read the full article at Whiskey Off-Road: The Mountain Bike Race That Cuts Through the Gravel Craze on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
